com.jereibaselibrary.db.litepal.tablemanager

类 Generator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jereibaselibrary.db.litepal.LitePalBase
      • com.jereibaselibrary.db.litepal.tablemanager.Generator
  • 直接已知子类:
    AssociationCreator

    public abstract class Generator
extends LitePalBase
    This class is the basic class for managing database dynamically. It is used to create or update tables by the mapping classes from litepal.xml file. Generator is a superclass, it just read the fields from classes and format the fields types into database types. The analysis job is delegated to the subclasses to do. Then subclasses can invoke the execute method to finish the job or they can override to do their own logic.
    从以下版本开始:
    1.0

      Analysis the AssociationsModel by the purpose of subclasses, and generate a SQL to do the intention job.

      Analysis the TableModel by the purpose of subclasses, and generate a SQL to do the intention job.

      protected java.util.Collection<TableModel> getAllTableModels()
      This is a shortcut way to get all the table models for each model class defined in the mapping list.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getAllTableModels

        protected java.util.Collection<TableModel> getAllTableModels()
        This is a shortcut way to get all the table models for each model class defined in the mapping list. No need to iterate all the model classes and get table model for each one.
        返回:
        A collection contains all table models.

      • getAllAssociations

        protected java.util.Collection<AssociationsModel> getAllAssociations()
        This method is used to get all the association models which in the mapping list of litepal.xml file.
        返回:
        Collection of RelationModel for all the mapping classes.

      • execute

        protected void execute(java.lang.String[] sqls,
                       android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase db)
        Use the parameter SQLiteDatabase to execute the passing SQLs. Subclasses can add their own logic when do the executing job by overriding this method.
        参数:
        sqls - SQLs that want to execute.
        db - instance of SQLiteDatabase
        抛出:
        DatabaseGenerateException

      • createOrUpgradeTable

        protected abstract void createOrUpgradeTable(android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase db,
                                             boolean force)
        Analysis the TableModel by the purpose of subclasses, and generate a SQL to do the intention job. The implementation of this method is totally delegated to the subclasses.
        参数:
        db - Instance of SQLiteDatabase.
        force - Drop the table first if it already exists.

      • addOrUpdateAssociation

        protected abstract void addOrUpdateAssociation(android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase db,
                                               boolean force)
        Analysis the AssociationsModel by the purpose of subclasses, and generate a SQL to do the intention job. The implementation of this method is totally delegated to the subclasses.
        参数:
        db - Instance of SQLiteDatabase.
        force - Drop the table first if it already exists.
